name: alkemann/h2l
description: A micro framework for websites and apis. This is a sequel of h.l, made for PHP 7

suggest.monolog/monolog: Advanced logging that can be plugged into the logger
suggest.mongodb/mongodb: A Mongo DB data connection is provided that uses this library
suggest.ext-pdo: For the MySql, Postgres and Sqlite Datasources.
suggest.alkemann/debug: Convenient var_dump replaces for debug and development, require-dev only
